name: 家园/HOME
description:
In the game world of Home, you will play a stone man, right! You and your Sand-sculpture neighbors are stone men! You can stay at home all day, read books, eat takeaway when you're hungry, and make money by developing computer games ( if you really want to make money so well ：D ). If you don't want to stay at home all the time, you can also explore outside, run cool between buildings, or find monsters invading your town and fight to death with them to find strange things. The root cause of invasion.

This game contains:
- It's a comfortable home environment (it's made of my room as a prototype)
- A leisure day-to-day life
- Stimulating battle experience
- Remarkably refreshing shooting feel
——————————————————
Hello, everyone, I am a 17-year-old secondary school student majoring in electricity. Making a game can be said to be my dream all the time.（I don't have download PhotoShip!） This is my first time to do game development, making use of weekends and holidays. If I can succeed this time, that's the biggest encouragement for me. I'll make another game with richer plot, more content and better painting quality than this one.
